questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what is the dominant color scheme of the product packaging?

Does the image showcase any noticeable design elements on the tea leaves themselves, besides their basic form?
What is the apparent color of the tea leaves as shown in the image, disregarding the packaging?
If we focus solely on the visible tea leaves, what is the general visual impression of their surface?

Judging by the image, does the product exhibit any apparent irregularities or imperfections?
In terms of the visual composition, what is the apparent arrangement of the tea leaves in the image?
